name: Spring Match
description:
Pass all the levels in a new Match 3 game - Spring Match! If you like the games of this genre you will definitely enjoy Spring Match. 

There are colorful blocks depicting birds, chamomiles, sun, ladybirds, apples and more. Put 3 or more identical blocks in a row to destroy them and gain points! Everything is not that easy! There are more and more blocks at each level and you can only move them horizontally. Some blocks are with chains which means you can't move them until you make a match with them, and they will totally disappear only after the second match! 

There are 3 modes in the game: "stages", "puzzles" and "endless". 

In the mode "stages" you are pressed for time as the blocks move higher and higher. Don't let the white line touch the top of the screen or you will lose! 

In the mode "puzzles" you are to destroy all blocks in the allotted number of turns. There are 30 different puzzles in this mode. In the "endless" mode you can choose the difficulty. 

Time passes fast with the game Spring Match. Use your logic and wit to gain as many points as you can!
